endpoints.description: Retrieve the detailed information on all connected distributed energy resources.
Initiate synchronization of distributed energy resources with the main grid.
Fetch the current status and performance metrics of the energy storage systems.
Perform calibration operations for optimal energy load balancing.
Obtain analytics data about the grid's energy demand trends over time.
Update configuration options for a specific distributed energy resource identified by its ID.
Remove a distributed energy resource from the management system using its ID.
Provide a list of current alerts related to energy resource operations.
Submit analytic data for monitoring renewable energy source performance.
Access logs of synchronization events between the main grid and distributed resources.
